The user strikes with lightning bolts. The bolts can be produced either from storm clouds<ref>''Boruto'' episode 166</ref> or the user themselves. Additionally, the bolts can be channelled through structures so as to strike at targets from multiple sources.<ref>''Boruto'' episode 175</ref>
